name: MLCLossDescriptor
desc: A configuration object you use to create a loss layer.

items.name: init(type: MLCLossType, reductionType: MLCReductionType)
items.desc: Creates a loss descriptor with the loss function and reduction type you specify.

items.name: init(type: MLCLossType, reductionType: MLCReductionType, weight: Float)
items.desc: Creates a loss descriptor with the loss function, reduction type, and weight you specify.

items.name: init(type: MLCLossType, reductionType: MLCReductionType, weight: Float, labelSmoothing: Float, classCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates a loss descriptor with the loss function, reduction type, weight, label smoothing, and number of classes you specify.

items.name: init(type: MLCLossType, reductionType: MLCReductionType, weight: Float, labelSmoothing: Float, classCount: Int, epsilon: Float, delta: Float)
items.desc: Creates a loss descriptor with the loss function, reduction type, weight, label smoothing, and number of classes, epsilon, and delta that you specify.

items.name: var reductionType: MLCReductionType
items.desc: The reduction operation performed by the loss function.

items.name: var weight: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you apply to each element of a result.
